title: Bug 116786: Library include should store relative path.
EB: When a library is included in a report design, the BIRT designer should generate and save the relative path for the library include. For example, if the report design is located at $project/test, and a library is included from $project/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary, the relative path should be stored as $project/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the BIRT designer.
2. Open a report design located at $project/test.
3. Include a library from $project/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary.
